features: MULTIFUNCTION 9-IN-1 DESIGN: Bake, broil, air fry, proof, dehydrate, slow cook, toast, warm, pizza.
INCLUDES: Stainless steel rack, baking pan, air fry basket, and crumb tray.
MAX HEAT TECHNOLOGY: Multi-element design delivers ultra-fast heating.
PLENTY OF ROOM: The large capacity fits a baking pan, toasts 6 slices of bread, up to 13” pizza, and air fries up to 4lbs.
SECURE GRIP: Cool-touch handles are designed to stay comfortable during operation.
SIMPLE PRESETS: Large LED temperature display make it easy to find the right setting for your meal.
VERSATILE COOKING: For big family feasts, individual meals, and everything in between.
STAINLESS STEEL RACK: Effortless adjusts to fit more food and accommodate big portions.
EASY TO CLEAN: Interior walls of the oven, baking pan, air fry basket, and crumb tray are coated in a PFAS-free nonstick for effortless cleaning.
body.description: Experience the easiest, fastest, and best way to take your cooking to the counter with GreenPan’s Bistro Noir 9-in-1 Air Fry Oven. From baking cookies and air frying chicken to slow cooking chili or making a personal pizza, this spacious oven is ready for any meal. The interior delivers plenty of room for family feasts and the stainless steel rack effortlessly adjusts to fit even more food. The air fry function is built for maximum heat circulation, making high heat searing and crispy air frying simple. With a large LED temperature control and cool-touch handles, this multifunctional oven makes cooking hassle-free from start to finish. Plus, the interior walls of the oven, baking pan, air fry basket, and crumb tray are coated in GreenPan’s PFAS-free nonstick coating for healthier meals and effortless cleaning.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GreenPan Bistro Stainless Steel 9-in-1 Air Fry Oven

TAKE ON ANY TASK Perfect for big family feasts, individual meals, and everything in between, this ultra-versatile appliance is ready for everything. Bake, broil, air fry, proof, dehydrate, slow cook, toast, warm, or make a pizza. POWERFULLY EASY Designed to make meals quick and easy, this oven’s multi-element design delivers superior heat circulation no matter what meal you’re cooking. PLENTY OF ROOM The large capacity fits a baking pan, toasts 6 slices of bread, up to 13” pizza, and air fries up to 4lbs. POWERFUL AIR FRYER The air fry function is built for maximum heat conduction & crispy results. SIMPLE PRESETS The large LED temperature display make it easy to find the right setting for your meal. EASY TO CLEAN The interior walls of the oven, baking pan, air fry basket, & crumb tray are coated in our PFAS-free nonstick for simple cleaning.

Previous page NONSTICK BASKET The easy-to-clean nonstick basket allows for healthier wings, fries, and more. SECURE GRIP The cool-touch handles are design to stay comfortable during operation. STAINLESS STEEL RACK The stainless steel rack effortlessly adjusts to fit more food & accommodate big portions. BAKING PAN Perfect for baking or roasting anything from cookies to veggies, meats, and more. Next page Your Oven Belongs on the Counter 1 NONSTICK BASKET 2 SECURE GRIP 3 STAINLESS STEEL RACK 4 BAKING PAN

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a replacement for my old school toaster oven. This can do all toaster oven functions plus dozens more. I mainly use it to air fry and warm up food. I prefer this type to the basket because you can see your food and it has different height levels for your racks. Grease easily falls to a lower rack for no fuss cleanup. Pretty large, but still fits on the countertop just fine. Only con is that you can't adjust the temp or timing once you've set it. You'll have to cancel the setting and restart. Not a huge issue though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Kitchen Appliance
reviews.reviewText: My family got into buying Green Pan products awhile ago, so I finally caved on buying this to go along with our collection! They make such pretty pans, but aside from that, they work beautifully and hold up the best out of anything we’ve ever had!This all-in-one slow cooker is AMAZING! I got rid of my CrockPots and won’t use anything else. Seems pricy at first but well worth the investment! Sometimes when you buy items that do more than one thing, no one thing is done super well. That is not the case with this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband loves it
reviews.reviewText: My husband does the cooking and he has enjoyed using this, very simple and straightforward. My part is the clean up and I will say that it washes up very quickly and easily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just one problem : (
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for two people. Easy to use and cooks great. My intention in buying this is to avoid the messy grease when cooking hamburgers in fry pan. I hate splattering grease so I thought this was the answer.One drawback is when the burgers are done and you open the lid, the grease runs outside the back behind the drip pan. An unfortunate flaw.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This thing is amazing. We’ve had it for a week. We upgraded from a small toaster oven and cannot be happier. I’ve never used an air fryer before so I’m still getting used to that, but that function has worked well when I’ve tried it. I was confused by the toast function at first because it doesn’t have a timer like the other functions do. But you just set the toast level and it stops on its own, and does a good job every time. The unit does get hot on the outside, but the handle doesn’t, so it doesn’t bother me. I just made sure the cord doesn’t touch any part of the back, because the back gets VERY hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Could not use - Kept Smoking and Fire Alarm Kept Coming
reviews.reviewText: I wish I can give you a better review, how it works, what I cooked, etc.I was not able to pass the initial phase, cleaning before using and turning it on.I followed the instructions to wash and wipe before the first use.Something was smoking. It said it would. But boy, fire alarm comes off.I disconnected it and figured, maybe I did not clean good enough. Waited for next day, wiped the whole thing again. Same thing.Third time, I really was looking where the smoke was coming from. The smoke was coming from the inside, it was like burning something inside. Between the base and the grill pan.Since that was something I could not wipe or wash, I ended up returning it.Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great for some things
reviews.reviewText: The baking feature is nice and seems to work well without making my small kitchen a million degrees like turning the oven on - I have only used it though for frozen items - no fresh foods. Toast feature works pretty well for a bagel. Anything on air fry stays soggy. The unit gets pretty hot - and so does the plug which is why I wont use it for anything longer than a half hour bake.All in all it takes up too much precious counter space to be worth it, I wouldnt buy it again.
